tool.name: Rank Pathways
tool.description: Rank heterologous pathways according to their global score
tool.command:
#for $file in $pathway_collection ln -s '$file' '$file.element_identifier' && #end for
python -m rptools.rprank --pathways
#for $file in $pathway_collection '$file.element_identifier' #end for
> '$sorted_pathways'
tool.help:
rpRanker - Rank Pathways ========================
Sort a list of pathways according to their global score.
Input -----
Required:
* **Pathways**\ : List of pathway files (rpSBML)
Output ------
* **Ranked Pathways**\ : Sorted names and scores of pathways
